WorkItem.Description:
While trying to force Silverlight to update Rawr3's offline format from b5 to b7, I tried deleting the Elitist Jerks website from the permission tab in Silverlight's option menu. When I tried to load up Rawr3 in Offline mode, I got the following message.
 
[Arg_NullReferenceException]
Arguments: 
Debugging resource strings are unavailable. Often the key and arguments provide sufficient information to diagnose the problem. See http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=106663&Version=4.0.50401.0&File=mscorlib.dll&Key=Arg_NullReferenceException
 
   at Rawr.UI.FileUtils.client_OpenReadCompleted(Object sender, OpenReadCompletedEventArgs e)
   at System.Net.WebClient.OnOpenReadCompleted(OpenReadCompletedEventArgs e)
   at System.Net.WebClient.OpenReadOperationCompleted(Object arg)
WorkItem.Summary: [Base] Error upon deleting EJ permission in Silverlight
